name: Kill Da Guy
description:
What do you do? You kill Da Guy!

*This game is very short and kinda dumb! Kill Da Guy 2 is longer, better, and is coming soon!

Kill Da Guy is a puzzle game for Mac and Windows, Where the task is to kill the guy who did something bad. Originally a Flash Game on Newgrounds.com but due to popular demand its now available on Itch!

NOTE: This game was originally going to receive purchasable level packs but after popular demand of the flash gaming community I have decided to make a sequel to it. This is simply a flash game wrapped with Adobe Air.
